DOC.brief_title: Co Enzyme Q10 Improves IVF Outcome With Advanced Reproductive Age
DOC.criteria: Age 3843 year time enrollment Diagnosis primary infertility Body mass index ( BMI ) > 30 kg/m2 Early follicular phase ( day 24 ) serum FSH level > 20 mIU/ml . Abnormal uterine cavity evidence sonohysterogram hysterosalpingography Any current use systemic steroid medication infertility treatment within 3 month study enrollment . Any contraindication pregnant carry pregnancy term . Contraindication use CoQ10 , fertility medication . Any ovarian abdominal abnormality may interfere adequate TVS evaluation . Absence one two ovary Clinically relevant systemic disease ( e.g. , Insulindependent diabetes , adrenal dysfunction , organic intracranial lesion , polycystic ovarian syndrome , hyperprolactinemia , hypothalamic tumor ) serious illness ( Neoplasia ) . History ( within past 12 month ) current abuse alcohol drug . Administration investigational drug within three month prior study enrollment . Any medical condition may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion study drug , gastrointestinal disease , mal absorption syndrome liver dysfunction Unexplained gynecological bleeding . The concurrent use follow drug : Daunorubicin , Doxorubicin , Blood Pressure Medications , Warfarin , Timolol , atorvastatin , cerivastatin , lovastatin , pravastatin , simvastatin gemfibrozil , tricyclic antidepressant medication ( include amitriptyline , amoxapine , clomipramine , desipramine , doxepin , imipramine , nortriptyline , protriptyline , trimipramine ) multivitamins vitamin supplementation except Folic acid .
